title: Resident Evil 4 Microtransactions?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.07.23
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% off 2 or more pairs of
polarized sunglasses.

Go to https://www.evildeadrisemovie.com/ to get your tickets NOW to see Evil Dead Rise in theaters April 21.

Blessing and Tim chat about Resident Evil 4's sales, microtransactions, and a weird new PlayStation patent.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:53 - Housekeeping
A new PS I Love You XOXO is up right now. The crew puts together their own PlayStation Showcases for you to judge. Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
Over on Patreon:
Two new episodes of Remember Blank are available where we remember our favorite Star Wars games and the games that FLOORED us.
The Roper Report   -
00:10:40 - Resident Evil 4 Remake Sales Top 4 Million Units
00:16:30 - Resident Evil 4 remake has added microtransactions to upgrade weapons quicker
00:28:08 - Sony Has reportedly Cut PSVR 2 Production by 20%
00:36:52 - A new Sony patent shows a controller that can change temperature
00:44:41 - The Super Mario Bros Movie soundtrack is now available online
00:46:50 - Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Cowabunga Collection Sells 1 Million Copies
00:48:45 - Out Today
00:51:40 - “Is there a story in the Star Wars universe that you would like to see as a game?” - David Mertz
00:54:52 - “If we ever get the Gamecube ported to the Switch…” - Jakey Oz
01:00:46 - You‘re Wrong
Monday’s Hosts: Greg & Tim

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
